channel.title: ACM on Terraform Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in ACM on Terraform Workshop

item.title: variable.tf
item.description: variable "region" { description = "생성될 리전." type = string default = "us-east-1" } variable "domain_root" { description = "Route53 에 등록된 도메인 명" type = string default = "mzdev.be" } variable "domain_name" { description = "ACM 인증서를 생성할 도메인 명" type = string default = "demo-api-workshop.mzdev.be" }

item.title: provider.tf
item.description: us-east-1 리전을 사용 하도록 합니다. provider "aws" { region = var.region }

item.title: acm.tf
item.description: AWS Certificate Manager 에 해당도메인에 해당하는 인증서를 만들도록 합니다. resource "aws_acm_certificate" "cert" { domain_name = var.domain_name subject_alternative_names = [ "*.${var.domain_name}" ] validation_method = "DNS" } resource "aws_route53_record" "cert" { zone_id = data.aws_route53_zone.this.id name = aws_acm_certificate.cert.domain_validation_options[0].resource_record_name type = aws_acm_certificate.cert.domain_validation_options[0].resource_record_type ttl = 60 records = [ aws_acm_certificate.cert.domain_validation_options[0].resource_record_value, ] } resource "aws_acm_certificate_validation" "cert" { certificate_arn = aws_acm_certificate.cert.arn validation_record_fqdns = [ aws_route53_record.cert.fqdn, ] }

item.title: route53.tf
item.description: zone_id 를 획득 하기위해 data 타입으로 조회 합니다. data "aws_route53_zone" "this" { name = var.domain_root }

item.title: output.tf
item.description: 인증서 arn 뿐 아니라, route53 의 zond_id 도 같이 리턴하여 활용 할수 있도록 했습니다. output "zone_id" { value = data.aws_route53_zone.this.id } output "name" { value = data.aws_route53_zone.this.name } output "certificate_id" { value = aws_acm_certificate.cert.id } output "certificate_arn" { value = aws_acm_certificate.cert.arn }
